title: Flight Control - Angle of Attack and Control Surfaces

targets.query: from(bucket: "mybucket") |> range(start: -5m) |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "flightcontrol" and r._field == "angle_of_attack")
from(bucket: "mybucket") |> range(start: -5m) |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "flightcontrol" and r._field == "control_surface_position")
